title: What can you say about the Illuminati? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a number of threads to this question, some quite ancient, but for purposes of modern development, read the “Confessions” series of books by Leo Zagami, but maybe start with this short $3 Kindle background piece to understand the hidden Jesuit / Masonic / Khazarian nexus of the multifaceted occult “Luciferian” conspiracy currently tightening its grip on the entire world through the CV19 “response” mechanisms:1666 Redemption Through Sin: Global Conspiracy in History, Religion, Politics and Finance: Sepehr, Robert: 9781943494019: Amazon.com: Books
I bought the card game but haven’t yet rounded up enough friends to play it, and given the ongoing COVID thing, probably won’t get a chance any time soon. Illuminati (game) - Wikipedia
